text: Pen kɨdek am Sakiyas kal ak takaw ag mɨdɨlɨg, Sakiyas tɨkjakɨl, Jisas nop agak, Bɨawl, nad nɨgan agak. Mɨñɨl tap yad okok bɨlok pɨs ak lɨl, pɨs ak binɨb yɨmgeptek okok kɨlop ñɨnɨgayn agak. Yad ned tay yepɨs agɨl, binɨb ogɨnap tap kɨlop si dɨnek tek lup okok, pen ñɨnɨg tap nokom olap dɨnek tek, pen omɨŋal omɨŋal ñɨnɨgayn agak.
